tgo:role.description: Is responsible for the project management
tgo:role.name: WPM - Work Package Manager

tgo:role.description: Is responsible for configuration and change aspects.

tgo:role.description: Covers the whole scope of specification and design

tgo:role.description: Defines the IVV strategy and manages the IVV team

tgo:role.description: Performs the IVV activities as defined by the IVV Leader
tgo:role.name: IE - IVV Engineer

tgo:role.description: Is responsible for the document identification and creation.
tgo:role.name: DM - Document Manager

tgo:role.description: Checks that the process is correctly applied on the project
tgo:role.name: QA - Quality Engineer
